function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Miscommunication of covid-19 transmission characteristics leading to public misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to acknowledge diverse levels of risk tolerance and perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguous information about outbreak handling by the government","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and conspiracy theories online","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in risk communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Government concealing information about the outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ambiguity in government communication","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of conspiracy theories and rumors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of timely warning to the public about the outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government decision making based on political interests and social stability rather than public health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in government control measures due to balancing political, stability, and economic factors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of scientific risk communication in decision making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate risk interpretation in communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited government information dissemination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in organic and inorganic waste due to online shopping and medical waste","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in waste recycling due to concerns about covid-19 packaging","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on global mortality","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased concentrations of no2 and pm2.5 due to quarantine measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in waste management due to concerns about virus spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of recycling programs due to virus spread concerns","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in noise levels due to reduced transportation and commercial activities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive indirect effects of covid-19 on the emissions during a short period","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to the internet in rural areas may hinder the evaluation of residents’ knowledge, attitudes, and
